description: Efficiently report workplace incidents with a comprehensive form.
name: Workplace Incident Report Form

steps.title: Workplace Incident Report Form
steps.text: Please complete the fields below to report any workplace incidents promptly. Your detailed report is crucial for ensuring the safety and well-being of our employees. Thank you for your cooperation in maintaining a safe work environment.

blocks.label: Email Address
blocks.help: Provide your email address for further communication.
blocks.name: email

blocks.label: Phone Number
blocks.help: Enter your phone number for any necessary follow-up.
blocks.name: phone

blocks.label: Manager/Supervisor Name
blocks.help: Enter the name of your supervisor or manager.
blocks.name: supervisor

blocks.label: Incident Date
blocks.help: Specify the date when the incident occurred.
blocks.name: date

blocks.label: Location of Incident
blocks.help: Provide the exact location where the incident took place.
blocks.name: location

blocks.label: Description of Incident
blocks.help: Provide a detailed description of what happened.
blocks.name: description

blocks.label: Witnesses
blocks.help: List the names and contact information of any witnesses.
blocks.name: witnesses

blocks.label: Injuries Sustained
blocks.help: Describe any injuries sustained as a result of the incident.
blocks.name: injuries

blocks.label: Immediate Action Taken
blocks.help: Describe any immediate actions taken in response to the incident.
blocks.name: immediate_action

blocks.label: Contributing Factors
blocks.help: Identify any factors that may have contributed to the incident.
blocks.name: contributing_factors

blocks.label: Preventative Measures Suggested
blocks.help: Suggest any measures to prevent similar incidents in the future.
blocks.name: suggested_measures

blocks.label: Signature
blocks.help: Sign to confirm the accuracy of the information provided.
blocks.name: signature
